Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 92nd/Burley
ShortDescription: Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted  via 92nd, Houston, 91st, and Brandon over regular route due to street blockage near 92nd/Burley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted  via 92nd, Houston, 91st, and Brandon over regular route due to street blockage near 92nd/Burley.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: Eastbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Western, 83rd, Kedzie, due to street blockage near 79th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Western, 83rd, Kedzie, then resume their normal route on 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Delayed near Ashberry
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are standing  near Ashbury due to an unauthorized person on the track. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are standing  near Asbury due to an unauthorized person on the track. Crews working to restore service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
